column1: #Text=Grosseto is a small city in the Tuscany region of Italy .
#Text=Is closed for civil traffic , although there are some sporadic flight usually charters .
#Text=The nearest airports are in Pisa ( about 160 km north ) , Florence ( about 85 km away ) and Rome ( about 180 km south ) .
#Text=Museum of Archaeology and Art of Maremma , Piazza Baccarini , 3 .
#Text=Museum of Natural History of the Maremma .
#Text=Duomo di Grosseto ( Grosseto Cathedral ) , Chiasso degli Zuavi 6 , ☏ +39056420143 , ✉ parrocchiacattedrale.grosseto@gmail.com .

#Text=Frattoria San Lorenzo , Via Aurelia Antica , 5 ( in the Maremma territory , bordered by the mouth of the River Ombrone and the Monti dell’Uccellina Natural Park ) , ☏ +39056424116 , fax : +39056423831 , ✉ info@fattoriasanlorenzo.it .
#Text=Park hotel Zibellino is an oasis of nature and history , on the splendid coast of Castiglione della Pescaia .
#Text=Hotel Residence Roccamare , Via delle Rocchette , ☏ +390564941124 , fax : +390564941133 , ✉ info@roccamare.it .
#Text=Terme di Sorano ( Residence with Apartments ) , Località Filetta 58010 , Sorano(Grosseto ) , ☏ +390564633306 , fax : +390564632028 , ✉ info@termedisorano.it .
#Text=Agriturismo in Toscana Il Passo degli Ulivi .
#Text=Agriturismo near Paganico , three comfortable self-catering apartments near Petriolo hot springs , airconditionin , garden , swimming pool .
#Text=Holiday rental home in medieval hilltop village 30 km north of Grosseto .
#Text=Very useful website with information and suggestions for things to do in Tuscany and in the Maremma .
#Text=A peaceful farmhouse presenting a large choice of bedrooms and apartments .
#Text=Tenuta San Carlo , Strada Provinciale 40 della Trappola 147/a 58046 Marina di Grosseto , fax : +39056431016 .
#Text=In the regional park of the area , Parco dell'Uccellina .
#Text=A great example of what it is like to live on an Italian farm .

#Text=The property is approximately 1,000 acres and has wildboar , horses , bovine , daini ( small deer ) , foxes , porcupines , turtles , many species of rare Italian birds , pine forests , swamp land , and natural fresh water and salt water beaches .
#Text=, Via IV Novembre n° 61 Marina di Grosseto , fax : +39056434607 .
#Text=The 3-star hotel is a few meters away from the sea shore .
#Text=It offers bedrooms , studio apartments and one bedroom apartments all in the same building .
#Text=All accommodations are sunny and welcoming , with all modern comforts : ensuite bathroom , telephone , terraces , air conditioning , safe and central heating .
#Text=Main towns - Porto Santo Stefano , Porto Ercole
